showScoreExcerpt: "Every song enhances the hilarity, expert staging heightens every gag, and the cast of fresh faces is blissfully good. Broadway hasn’t seen anything like it since Mel Brooks came to town with “The Producers,” only “Mormon” has better songs."

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Unqualified praise across all elements with superlative comparisons to classic Broadway hits and no caveats or criticisms. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses unqualified enthusiasm for the production, highlighting its humor, staging, and cast quality, indicating a strong recommendation to see it.
